# iosxr_cef_pbts_forward_class (Resource)

This resource can manage the CEF PBTS Forward Class configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_cef_pbts_forward_class" "example" {
  forward_class    = "1"
  fallback_to_drop = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `forward_class` (String) Forward Class number

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `fallback_to_any` (Boolean) Fallback to any class
- `fallback_to_class` (List of Number) Fallback to certain classes
- `fallback_to_drop` (Boolean) Fallback to drop

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_cef_pbts_forward_class.example "<forward_class>"
```
